KB2736233.name: Security Update for ActiveX Killbits
KB2736233.desc: This update addresses the vulnerability discussed in Microsoft Security Advisory KB2736233. To find out if other security updates are available for you, see the Overview section of this page.

KB2732052.name: Update for Windows Server 2003 and Windows Server 2008
KB2732052.desc: Install this update to resolve issues caused by revised daylight saving time and time zone laws in several countries.

KB2661254.desc: Install this update to keep your system up to date by increasing the minimum level of encryption on Windows systems.

KB2712808.desc: A security issue has been identified that could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to compromise your system and gain control over it.

KB2722913.name: Cumulative Security Update for Internet Explorer
KB2722913.desc: This update addresses the vulnerability discussed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS12-052. To find out if other security updates are available for you, see the Overview section of this page.

KB2721693.name: Security Update for Microsoft XML Core Services 6.0 Service Pack 2
KB2721693.desc: A security issue has been identified in Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) that could allow an attacker to compromise your Windows-based system and gain control over it.
